title: CBIC Revises Customs Tariff Values: An Important Update for Importers
content:
# CBIC Revises Customs Tariff Values: An Important Update for Importers

Ek important update hai for all Chartered Accountants and businesses involved in imports. The Central Board of Indirect Taxes and Customs (CBIC) ne kuch goods ke tariff values revise kiye hain.

*   **What's New:** CBIC ne Notification No. 77/2025–Customs (N.T.) issue ki hai, dated December 15, 2025.
*   **Key Change:** Is notification ke through, Section 14(2) of the Customs Act, 1962 ke under kai notified goods ke tariff values revise kiye gaye hain.
*   **Impact:** Yeh revision Notification No. 36/2001–Customs (N.T.) mein naye valuation tables substitute karta hai, jiska direct impact import costing par hoga aur iska aim valuation litigation ko kam karna hai.
*   **Effective Date:** Yeh changes December 16, 2025 se lagu ho gaye hain (prospectively).
*   **Affected Goods:** Jin goods par yeh changes applicable hain, unmein edible oils (jaise Crude Palm Oil, RBD Palm Oil, Crude Soyabean Oil), precious metals (Gold, Silver), brass scrap, aur areca nuts (supari) shaamil hain.
